replies.body:
We cannot manually review individual PBE applications, but I'd be happy to provide additional context on the PBE process. First, the criteria with which we select testers for the PBE changes quite frequently, depending on what we're testing at the time. Something that remains consistent is that we look for *really active* players that are a *positive influence* on the community.

You can check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on the system. Please let me know if you have any questions.
